column2: at one stage in the writing of the Númenor myth
column3: the son of Elendil. His role was later replaced by Isildur.

column1: A derisive name given to Herendul was Terendul
The name includes Qenya heren "fortune" and is translated by Tolkien with the Old English name Eadwine.
column2: entry KHER Obviously his name means "Fortune-Friend".
